meanings.definition: In a manner relating to meteors or meteorites.
meanings.sent1: The shooting star streaked meteorically across the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The meteor shower appeared meteorically, dazzling everyone below.
meanings.sent3: The alien mistook fireworks for meteorites and landed meteorically on Earth.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas fell meteorically from the sky, surprising everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The news of the discovery spread meteorically, capturing the attention of the entire town.
